title: Group Therapy: She Wants to Re-Connect with Her Son
description: Lori hasn't spoken to her son in about 10 years and she's not doing very well, health-wish.  She's considering showing up at his house on Christmas Eve to see him but wants to know if that's a good idea.
itunes:summary: Lori hasn't spoken to her son in about 10 years and she's not doing very well, health-wish.  She's considering showing up at his house on Christmas Eve to see him but wants to know if that's a good idea.
